hypothesis_content.title: BTC Daily RSI Extreme Reversion in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC is in a NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 60%) and its daily RSI(14) exceeds 70 or falls below 30, a mean reversion move of at least 5% back toward the 50 level will occur within the next 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes suggest range-bound, consolidating markets where overbought/oversold conditions are less likely to sustain strong momentum breaks. The 5% target is a typical mean reversion swing within a range.
entry_conditions: BTC daily RSI(14) > 70 OR BTC daily RSI(14) < 30
Enter on next daily candle open after condition is met

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% price move in reversion direction from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 2% adverse move beyond the extreme (e.g., if RSI>70, stop if price moves 2% higher)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 55% of trades are profitable (win rate < 0.55) OR average profit/loss ratio < 1.2 over a sample of at least 50 signals.
